Current

May 07, 2013

  • Develop and contribute to freeIPA, an open-sourced, Linux-based identity management system written in Python.
  • Integrate freeIPA into key Open Source projects, including OpenShift, Puppet, and Satellite.
  • Act as an ambassador between Open Source projects and freeIPA to improve communication, implementation, and community.

Relevant blog posts: Kerberos; Netsec for n00bs part 1, part 2, part 3, and relevant talks: DjangoCon EU: Introduce Django to your old friends.
